thread.title: Madonna tweets her support for the Women's March in the most Madonna way possible
thread.title_full: Madonna tweets her support for the Women's March in the most Madonna way possible

author: Heather Dockray
title: Madonna tweets her support for the Women's March in the most Madonna way possible
text:
Just when you thought Madonna had finally dropped off the map, she busts back in the with a picture of a shaved vagina.
The pop icon recently announced her support for the Women's March on Washington with a tweet that left us all breathless. And confused. And maybe concerned for her psychological state but also completely fine because this is Madonna we're talking about.
SEE ALSO: Madonna getting brutally honest about sexism is 100% inspiring
Here's the tweet:
Ya ! Just Do it! @Nakid_Magazine ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ğŸƒâ€â™€ï¸ 1 Million Women's March!! Be There!! pic.twitter.com/YMBIpUG2Vf
â€” Madonna (@Madonna) January 12, 2017
And here's the explanation:
Why Madonna chose to express her support with a picture of a Nike symbol on a shaved vagina, nobody knows. Perhaps not even Madonna herself.
BONUS: In stunning exchange, Trump refuses to answer question from CNN reporter
